backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining profiles, achievements with verification workflow, access control, and storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment runbook outlining pre-deployment checks and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with theme provider, auth gate, app shell, and route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AchievementDetai: Displays full achievement details including certificate image, links, metadata, and verification history.
Form for creating or editing achievements with link management and certificate image upload/preview.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Defines the main application layout with navigation, theming controls, and responsive sidebar.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps protected content, handling authentication, profile loading, errors, and login flow.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatusButton: Shows the authenticated user's avatar menu with profile info and logout option.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBanner.tsx: Displays an error alert with a title and message when an error is provided.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a form modal for creating or completing a user profile with role-specific fields.
frontend/src/components/SearchResultsLis: Renders a list of achievement search results with metadata and a detail view trigger.
frontend/src/components/VerificationActi: Offers verify and reject controls for achievements with a confirmation dialog and notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles and achievements via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with custom theming variables and UI helper classes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Supplies build metadata via environment variables and formats it for display.
frontend/src/lib/chatbotParser.ts: Parses natural language prompts into structured achievement search filters, returning either filters or clarification requests.
frontend/src/lib/chatbotSearch.ts: Executes achievement searches based on parsed chatbot filters, applying prioritized and additional filtering.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes unknown or backend errors into userâ€‘friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/file.ts: Converts browser File objects to Uint8Array buffers and checks if uploaded files are images.
frontend/src/lib/permissions.ts: Implements role-based permission checks for verifying and editing achievements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains UI and data helpers such as class merging, date formatting, and category/status label utilities.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides input validation functions for student IDs, names, emails, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and the Internet Identity provider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Displays, filters, creates, and verifies student achievements with detail panels and form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ChatbotPage.tsx: Implements an AI assistant UI that parses user queries and returns filtered achievement results.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows a personalized dashboard with stats, role-based messaging, and quick navigation for users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and edit their profile information with form validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Provides search tools for achievements by student ID or text keywords with result lists and detail panels.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationQueuePage: Renders the achievement verification queue, handling access control, loading states, list display, and verification actions via a detail dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and notes about the current Motoko compilation issue to be fixed.
